import './rightbar.css' import {Users} from "../../dummyData"; import Onlinefriends from '../onlinefriends/onlinefriends'; function Rightbar({user}) { const public_folder=process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const HomeRightbar=()=>{ return ( <>

) } const ProfileRightbar=()=>{ return( <>

) } return (
) } export default Rightbar
